com.hybris.services.entitlements.facade

Class DefaultEntitlementFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.facade.DefaultEntitlementFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitlementFacade

    public class DefaultEntitlementFacade
extends Object
implements EntitlementFacade
    This class hides collaboration between services, entitlements and conditions.

    This is the default implementation

        Parameters:
        action - action to perform. See Actions for possible options.
        userId - user identifier
        entitlementType - type of entitlement
        criterionData - execution criteria
        details - if true - return list of effective grants.
        Returns:

      • execute

        @Transactional
public ExecuteManyResult execute(String action,
                                                String userId,
                                                List<ExecuteManyData> executeManyDataList,
                                                Boolean details)
        Description copied from interface: EntitlementFacade
        Perform given action on user's entitlements.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface EntitlementFacade
        Parameters:
        action - action to perform. Only check is supported yet.
        userId - user identifier
        executeManyDataList - the list of executeManyData
        details - if true - return list of effective grants.
        Returns:
        results of action in the same order as executeManyDataList.

      • getGrants

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public List<GrantData> getGrants(String userId,
                                                               String entitlementType,
                                                               String grantSource,
                                                               String grantSourceId)
        Description copied from interface: EntitlementFacade
        Get effective user grants by filter.
        Specified by:
        getGrants in interface EntitlementFacade
        Parameters:
        userId - user identifier
        entitlementType - type of entitlement. Omit to get all user entitlements.
        grantSource - the reason of grant. Omit to do not take the reason into account. Must be null if entitlementType is null.
        grantSourceId - external id. Omit to do not take it into account. Must be null if grantSource is null.
        Returns:
        list of found grants.

      • revokeGrants

        @Transactional
public void revokeGrants(String userId,
                                        String entitlementType,
                                        String grantSource,
                                        String grantSourceId)
        Description copied from interface: EntitlementFacade
        Revoke user grants by filter.
        Specified by:
        revokeGrants in interface EntitlementFacade
        Parameters:
        userId - user identifier
        entitlementType - type of grant. Omit to revoke all user grants.
        grantSource - the reason of grant. Omit to do not take the reason into account. Must be null if entitlementType is null.
        grantSourceId - external id. Omit to do not take it into account. Must be null if grantSource is null.
